simple_sword.name: Simple Sword

great_axe.description: A heavy axe that requires two hands to wield effectively.

basic_leather_armor.description: Armor made from cured animal hides.

gauntlets_of_strength.description: These sturdy gauntlets make your grip stronger.

ring_of_protection_basic.name: Basic Ring of Protection
ring_of_protection_basic.description: A simple ring offering minor magical protection.

healing_potion_minor.description: A vial of red liquid that restores a small amount of health.

admin_cube.name: Admin Cube of Testing
admin_cube.description: A mysterious cube for testing purposes.
